message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents a fair price for its value, I understand your position.  Could you meet me halfway at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
